name: Feline West
description:
Feline fate is a western themed card game which we'll follow along the story of coots the fastest gunslinger in west!

You can press R to restart the level.(If game freezes or something use this.)

Rules:

Deck contains 4 of each card.

Game Objective: 

The goal of the game is to reduce your opponent's health to 0 while keeping your own health at 9. 

Game Setup :

Each player is dealt 3 cards from the deck. 2. Each player starts with 9 health. 

Gameplay 

1. The player who goes first is determined randomly. 2. On their turn, the player must either play a card from their hand onto the field or discard a card to damage the opponent.

3. If a player has a card on the field, they can discard that card and damage the opponent.

4. A player can discard a maximum of 3 times in a row. If they do, they gain 1 health healing and can finish the round without discarding a card.

 5. Only one card can be played onto the field per turn. 

6. After a card is discarded or played, the player draws a new card from the deck. 

Game End :The game ends when one player's health drops to 0. The other player is declared the winner.

All the art in the game is made using AI. Sound effects are free no copyright sound effects.
